name: 96black
tagline: Make the web a better place for you.
description:
To be a rockstar online, you're going to need much more than just a good website. 96black works by operating as an extension of your business, handling and coordinating your online activities and working together with you and your existing network of suppliers.
96black came about from the merging of two companies. 96degrees and Black Knight. Both companies were operating in the same space with similar markets, systems and technologies.

locations.address: Unit 1, Level 3, 58 Surrey Cres, Grey Lynn
